Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Paul, this is John. I am writing this email from Salesforce, to show you a template of an email I would like to introduce. A few things:
1- Notice the images on top and the bottom of this email (if you don't see the images is because you don't have the option activated in your software. Some parents might not have it activated but most will)
2- I am keen to change, cause as a parent, I am seeing the format of emails sent by the school, and although ok, they are are not great. We could obviously do better.
3- Notice that you will see the email addressed to "Mr. Corr". This is actually done automatically. I can show how.
4- On the Mass email function, I have introduced a filter, "Parents from A to N" and from "O to Z". This is parents starting from those letters, and its a better way of dividing people up, cause it avoids parents receiving 2 or more emails, in cases when they have children in different year groups.
What do you think? If you like it, lets sit down tomorrow and I can show you how everything is done. Pretty much like before, but just need to select a different Email template, Cheers
